column5: Hey Camo, First part of July starts bringin the big girls out to their summer haunts. Make sure you fish the mid lake reef. Who are you flying with?

We are flying with PFO, we go in on 6/30 and fly out on 7/7. We are just hoping for a good safe trip and for the new guys to get on some fish. Really getting excited now, just finished paying the outfitter, sent in the grocery and bait order and starting to get the gear together. We fly from Atlanta to I-Falls the day before and stay at Hilltop motel. I think our flight out is 10:30 on Sat. Thanks for all the info you have shared. It is obviously a special place to you and we hope to do you proud on the fishing and exploring!

First time going up in August. Any reports back? Im trying to map off some of the info on these threads but having a hard time finding "The Wall", "Rabbit head". I have found the NWO camp and Rusty Myers camp and Pipestone camps. Any pointers would be appreciated!!!!
Fishing was great this spring, better than average. Who ya goin with?
Please let everyone know how you do.My group goes in to Wabakimi June 21.Have fun !
Hey Glenn, As it stands, we are a party of 4 and I'm fine with that. Makes camp life easy. Look forward to hearing about your trip as well! It's the best time of the year... our trips to Wabakimi!
wabakimi on June 3? Will the ice be out by then? We are heading to Whitewater with MLO on June 27 and Im worried about the weather
Yup, the ice will be all out and the walleye layin in like cordwood, bitin like crazy! Hey jveri, have a great one on the Big Whitewater.

Pikeslayer, I hope you have a great trip! We will be on Wabakimi about a month later. I am really looking forward to it after reading the other Wabakimi thread. We will have several first timers in our group and I think this will be a great introduction to fly-in fishing for them. Sent from my iPad using Tapatalk
Make sure Spike brings the monkey along on your trip See ya Friday dude. PjShorthorn
Oh, the monkey will be there... Yes, Friday will be primo North Ga walleye fishing weather, Saturday and Sunday are looking like great days to wear the rain gear!
I'll see if I have any cows left too.... PjShorthorn
Hope You had a GREAT Day today, PAT !!
Thank you sir! Work got in the way , but I'm relaxing now. Hope you don't mind, but I'm spreading the Ruckster legacy and passion for blow up animals on fishing trips... PjShorthorn

Both of my nephews' wives are having babies in June and my Brother in Law has set a August trip for them so I'm missing half my group. Even my youngest son can't go this year as he decided to be responsible with his employment. I need a few good men to join myself, my brother and son for a trip to Wabakimi. Depending on the size of the group, the price is on the NWO website. http://www.northernwilderness.net/rates I will plan on purchasing food and we eat well. Fishin's usually pretty good the first week in June. We typically stay at the Rondesvoux the night before (June 2) so we can be at the airbase when they are ready to take us in.
This just may work for me. Will look into this more. Sent from my Pixel 2 XL using Tapatalk
Pikeslayer, I would love to join you but we are booked for a fly in the week after. I would have loved to enjoy you cooking! Hope it fills. FISH ON! Hooks

Bill, I wish I could make it with you guys. Apparently your nephews got caught up in the throws of passion and didn't count how many months in advance the trip was scheduled for before making that fateful decision. The good news is that you will have two new great nieces or nephews to train up on Canadian fishing adventures. Give Jimi a jingle. I know he and they boys are going to Tomahawk this summer on LOTW, but he could use a second trip to Canada this year. He will even bring the blow up animals with him. I sent him a blow up cow and monkey for Christmas to add to his sheep collection. PjShorthorn
If I didn't already have plans I'd be all over that Bill. It would be an honor to join your group at Wabakimi.
That would Be a fun trip ! ALAS, I am headed to WYOMING on the 7th.... I "could" however... lend the "animals" to Bill for a week... lol!
Will send you a PM in the next 15 minutes.

Hope it works for ya. What do you have in mind? Quote: Originally Posted by HeHooksHimselfPikeslayer, I would love to join you but we are booked for a fly in the week after. I would have loved to enjoy you cooking! Hope it fills. FISH ON! HooksDang Hooks, just pack up Doc and come a week early and stay through June. Quote: Originally Posted by pjshorthornBill, I wish I could make it with you guys. Apparently your nephews got caught up in the throws of passion and didn't count how many months in advance the trip was scheduled for before making that fateful decision. The good news is that you will have two new great nieces or nephews to train up on Canadian fishing adventures. Give Jimi a jingle. I know he and they boys are going to Tomahawk this summer on LOTW, but he could use a second trip to Canada this year. He will even bring the blow up animals with him. I sent him a blow up cow and monkey for Christmas to add to his sheep collection. PjShorthorn Thanks for the kind words Pat and it would be really awesome if you could go, but how come it always comes back to the blow up dolls! Quote: Originally Posted by Mike BorgerIf I didn't already have plans I'd be all over that Bill. It would be an honor to join your group at Wabakimi.You were the first I thought of, but I also was aware of your trip to St Joe, thanks to FB. Someday Mike.... Someday Quote: Originally Posted by jimirjrThat would Be a fun trip ! ALAS, I am headed to WYOMING on the 7th.... I "could" however... lend the "animals" to Bill for a week... lol!Jimi's always had an open invitation, but his Glendo trip with him long time buds, has been too strong a tradition for him. Of course now that he is experimenting with blow up critters, might have to re-evaluate this open invitation thing.

C'mon Man !!!! It is all about the Bare Necessities .....that's why !!!!!https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=9ogQ0uge06o Sorry Bill, but Jimi sent a PM to me saying I was off base about the Bare Necessities. Apparently, this video is a little more on point according to him. https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=77F76TuRMoQ PjShorthorn
Grumps is in, but I'd like a couple more.
